name: Multirostro(Gerome)
description: An exploration of the depiction of different tones of skin, the creation of an image as an artifice, in this case, making a copy of the "portrait of a Bazhik Bazhouk" made by Jean-Leon Gerome (1824-1904) in the tradition of copying as a medium of learning as a key practice in the academic painting of the 19th century, while at the same time making it a reflection on mortality ("memento mori")and technological optimism (think before sync). As a whole, this and other pieces in the same format are an exploration in the qualities of the image in the contemporary world, as animated statements, from gifs used in our daily mobile conversations to the big screens repeating an endless advertising in the luminous billboards of the street, an image of kinetic nature, movement and light, colour and light. filetype: mp4/mkv  author: gefercan year of creation: 2022 lenght: 30 seconds (aprox) size: 1280 x 1280 (aprox).
